description: Returns information about a specific code signing job. You specify the job by using the jobId value that is returned by the  StartSigningJob operation.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the signing job on input.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the signing job on output.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Key name of the bucket object that contains your unsigned code.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: Version of your source image in your version enabled S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: signingMaterial
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of your code signing certificate.

nested_items.name: certificateArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificates that is used to sign your code.

nested_items.name: platformId
nested_items.description: The microcontroller platform to which your signed code image will be distributed.

nested_items.name: platformDisplayName
nested_items.description: A human-readable name for the signing platform associated with the signing job.

nested_items.name: profileName
nested_items.description: The name of the profile that initiated the signing operation.

nested_items.name: profileVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the signing profile used to initiate the signing job.

nested_items.name: overrides
nested_items.description: A list of any overrides that were applied to the signing operation.

nested_items.name: signingConfiguration
nested_items.description: A signing configuration that overrides the default encryption or hash algorithm of a signing job.

nested_items.name: encryptionAlgorithm
nested_items.description: A specified override of the default encryption algorithm that is used in a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: hashAlgorithm
nested_items.description: A specified override of the default hash algorithm that is used in a code-signing job.

nested_items.name: signingImageFormat
nested_items.description: A signed image is a JSON object. When overriding the default signing platform configuration, a customer can select either of two signing formats, JSONEmbedded or JSONDetached. (A third format value, JSON, is reserved for future use.) With JSONEmbedded, the signing image has the payload embedded in it. With JSONDetached, the payload is not be embedded in the signing image.

nested_items.name: signingParameters
nested_items.description: Map of user-assigned key-value pairs used during signing. These values contain any information that you specified for use in your signing job.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: Date and time that the signing job was created.

nested_items.name: completedAt
nested_items.description: Date and time that the signing job was completed.

nested_items.name: signatureExpiresAt
nested_items.description: Thr expiration timestamp for the signature generated by the signing job.

nested_items.name: requestedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM principal that requested the signing job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the signing job.

nested_items.name: statusReason
nested_items.description: String value that contains the status reason.

nested_items.name: revocationRecord
nested_items.description: A revocation record if the signature generated by the signing job has been revoked. Contains a timestamp and the ID of the IAM entity that revoked the signature.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: A caller-supplied reason for revocation.

nested_items.name: revokedAt
nested_items.description: The time of revocation.

nested_items.name: revokedBy
nested_items.description: The identity of the revoker.

nested_items.name: signedObject
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket where the signed code image is saved by AWS Signer.

nested_items.name: bucketName
nested_items.description: Name of the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Key name that uniquely identifies a signed code image in your bucket.

nested_items.name: jobOwner
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the job owner.

nested_items.name: jobInvoker
nested_items.description: The IAM entity that initiated the signing job.
